Song.title: Judge Of The Secrets
Song.copyright: © 2013 Sovereign Grace Praise Words & Music by Dave Fournier

Arrangement.text:
Intro: [||: G | D | A | :||]
Verse 1: O holy J[G]udge, here is my [D]heart;{,} what can I [A]say to You? Where could I [G]run, how could I [D]hide? Darkness is [A]day to You The heart of a [Em]man is a maze with[D/F#]in So, come, light the [G]way, illuminate [A]sin Nothing’s con[G]cealed, all is re[D]vealed;{,} Jesus, I [A]yield to [D]You
Chorus: Judge of the [G]secrets of the hearts of [D]men Here I sur[G]render and humbly rep[D]ent [| A] You've conquered my [Bm]soul;{,} [|] [G] now be its de[D]fense [| A] Judge of the s[G]ecrets of the [A]hearts of [(1x intro) (2x instrumental)]men
Verse 2: I was cond[G]emned under Your [D]law;{,} rightly, I [A]stood accused I felt my [G]need, my conscience a[D]greed, I was with[A]out excuse So how can I j[Em]udge the ones who f[D/F#]all? I know in my [G]heart I’m just like them [A]all I will conf[G]ess: my righteous[D]ness, Jesus, must [A]rest in [D]You
Instr.: [||: G | A | Bm | A/C# | G | A | Em7 | F#m7 :||]
Tag: O holy J[G]udge, here is my [D]heart What can I [A]say to You? I will not [G]run, I will not [D]hide I know I’m [A]safe with [G]You [(intro to end)]
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 o holy judge here is my heart what can i say to you where could i run how could i hide darkness is day to you the heart of a man is a maze within so come light the way illuminate sin nothings concealed all is revealed jesus i yield to you chorus judge of the secrets of the hearts of men here i surrender and humbly repent youve conquered my soul now be its defense judge of the secrets of the hearts of men verse 2 i was condemned under your law rightly i stood accused i felt my need my conscience agreed i was without excuse so how can i judge the ones who fall i know in my heart im just like them all i will confess my righteousness jesus must rest in you instr tag o holy judge here is my heart what can i say to you i will not run i will not hide i know im safe with you
